Reviews.Title: “Descent location but poor hotel”
Reviews.Author: davi d
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel february 2012 quality location easy distance shops restaurants transport photos hotel flattering spacious brilliantly lite bathroom especially ceiling signs damp penetration tiling looked knackered bedroom draughty floor looked little grimy staff friendly quality service improved considerably particularly dining breakfast ok

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel whilst business using sounds bad hotel business travellers internet connection tv spanish channels visible aircon am system facility guide helpful hotel clean bathrooms wear tear looking economical hotel base visiting barcelona tick lot boxes situated comfortable criticism breakfast especially coffee morning dreadful starbucks 730am nearby 45 minutes free wifi

Reviews.Content: reading varying reviews hotel book minute 2 night stay visit son hospital little apprehensive found hotel clean service location excellent hotel shabby painting carried whilst noisy door system enter stay

Reviews.Title: “It was OK... good location, but not really 4 star...”
Reviews.Author: El-Yuca-Ingles
Reviews.Content: hotel fine opinion rate international 4 star standard means facilities limited clean location acceptable size twin beds comfortable bathroom fine appeared people staying hotel else time encounter noise issues hotel internet service wired wireless free chargeable surely requirement 4 star buffet breakfast try apart catering available overall ok reasonable rate hotwire bill 4 star property expecting 4 star standard bit disappointed rate 3 star

Reviews.Title: “Good stay”
Reviews.Author: livin_in_a_dream
Reviews.Content: stayed parents grandma brother dont majority complain hotel gotico mean true doesnt deserve entitled 4 star satisfactory id maybe 3 location couldnt clean staff friendly breakfast wasnt goodbut guess depends individual opinions bedroom ok parents bigger 109 fine family day sleep shower eat breakfast time id recommend hotel gotico looking fancy spend time hotel isnt im content dont understand reviews told hotel recently renovated maybe thats reason

Reviews.Title: “Very adequate”

Reviews.Content: stayed wife july 21th july 26th 2010 regardless age condition hotel location perfect snd breakfast food day clean single beds pushed bath shower tub clean food greatthe location perfect staff helpful speak english recomend zoo double decker bus bus 10 hours day able entire city
